metadata.title: CVE-2022-24918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An authenticated user can create a link with reflected Javascript codeinside it for itemsâ€™ page and send it to other users. The payload can beexecuted only with a known CSRF token value of the victim, which is changedperiodically and is difficult to predict. Malicious code has access to allthe same objects as the rest of the web page and can make arbitrarymodifications to the contents of the page being displayed to a victimduring social engineering attacks.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
